page.title: 11SCHOOL LIFE AT SCARVA
page.content: We go to school at five or ten past nine as school begins at 9.15 am. First we all go to Assembly where the Headmaster,Mr. Potts talks to us and then we sing a hymn, say prayers and return to our classroom. We start with spellings followed by mathematics. By then it is 10.30.,time for our Break. During our Break we eat crisps and go outside to play rounders or football. The bell rings at 10.50. when we come in and usually finish our mathematics. Later we take note of our homework after which we read ,write or discuss work we plan to do. Our lunch time lasts from 12.30. to 1.20. Most afternoons are spent doing such things as music,environmental projects,needlework and craft. School ends at 3.10.pm..
